info.name: NetrunnerDB Dark
info.description: Darkened Theme for Netrunnerdb.com. If you find any issues, leave a comment and I will try to address it. NetrunnerDB is a site for looking up Android: Netrunner Cards.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.4.1

    -Fixed Search Box when building a deck

Version 1.4.0

    -Fixed it not working (Https from HTTP)
    -Changed the Remove Suggestion button at deck building to be more visible

Version 1.3.0

    -Fixed all Wells
    -Beautified the CSS

Version 1.2.4

    -Fixed the No Deck Jumbotron

Version 1.2.3

    -Changed how @name works in comments

Version 1.2.2

    -Fixed Longpage Pagination

Version 1.2.1

    -Fixed ID Modal

Version 1.2

    -Fixed Find Card Page

Version 1.1

    -Edited borders on larger screens to be purple
    -Fixed Drop Down Menu for Factions for Larger Screens

Version 1.0

    -Created and released
